attributes.action: Stop heating allowances for Members of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of heating is rising again in April by 54% people have to choose between eating or heating their homes this is absolutely disgraceful.
attributes.background: Stop giving heating grants to yourselves and give the money to the elderly and the poor.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
